hero.subtitle: Websites, web apps, IT stuff, and network headaches. Full-stack developer and field technician based in Otumba, Estado de Mexico. I also speak English, if that helps.

services.title: What can i build for you
services.subtitle-one: I'm not just a developer, i've done everything from fiber optic cables to building full-stack apps deployed on the cloud. Here's what i can actually help you with.
services.subtitle-two: I keep my queue to 3 projects so i can actually focus on yours, no assembly line stuff.

one.title: Full-stack web application
one.description: Need a complete app? User logins, an admin panel, orders, whatever? I'll build it backend and frontend. Angular + ASP.NET, deployed and everything. No templates, built for you specifically.

two.title: Frontend-only website
two.description: Landing page, portfolio, business site. No backend needed. Looks great, loads fast, works on mobile. Done in about a week.

three.title: Network & IT
three.description: Fiber optic termination, UTP crimping, router config, troubleshooting? PC upgrades, updates, or custom rig builds? I've done ISP-level field work, no problem is too deep in the weeds.

four.title: Desktop application (Windows)
four.description: Windows app that needs to work offline, talk to hardware, or do something a website can't? I've got you. I work with WPF/.NET, MVVM architecture, and i enjoy solving weird, specific problems.

five.title: Bilingual translation / localization (EN/ES)
five.description: Spanish â†” English. Your website, app strings, documents, or emails. Native Spanish, fluent English. I can translate documents, websites, or act as a bilingual point of contact. Technical and general content welcome.

six.title: Maintenance & fixes
six.description: Got a site that's broken, slow, or outdated? Need a new feature for a pre-existing website? Send it my way. One-off fixes or ongoing maintenance. I don't ghost clients after delivery.
